property.name: userLevelDocumentation
property.configure:
This actor calls ClustalW for Sequence Alignment. The Cipres-Kepler registry is used to provide the application information for ClustalW. After setting all the application related information, such as command name, GUIGen XML file, and standard output/error files, this actor invokes ClustalW and retrieves back the alignment result after the execution.
This actor inherits GUIRunCIPRes actor since basically it is a customized GUIRunCIPRes actor to call external Cipres programs.

property.name: port:standardError
property.configure: The standard error stream of the execution is sent out through this port.

property.name: port:inputParameterValue
property.configure: The input parameter value (usually the name of the input file of the execution) is sent through this port.

property.name: port:inputParameterName
property.configure: The input parameter name (usually "infile") is sent through this port.

property.name: port:exitCode
property.configure: The exit code of the execution is sent out through this port.

property.name: port:outputParameterValue
property.configure: The output parameter value, usually the name of the output file of the execution, is sent out throught this port.

property.name: port:standardOutput
property.configure: The standard output stream of the execution is sent out through this port.

property.name: prop:monitoredErrorWords
property.configure: The monitored words are defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:parameterForOutput
property.configure: The GUIRun parameter to be send out is defined in this parameter. Usually this GUIRun parameter is "outfile".

property.name: prop:uiXMLFile
property.configure: The GUIGen xml file's path and name are defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:errorFile
property.configure: The standard error file's path and name are defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:workingDirectory
property.configure: The workfing directory of the external program is defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:outputFile
property.configure: The standard output file's path and name are defined in this parameter.

property.name: prop:command
property.configure: The command path and name are defined in this parameter.
